short_summary: Transport Canada requires services to provide managerial, functional and technical system support services.
description: This procurement is conditionally set aside under the federal government Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business.
full_summary:
================#

### Task-Based Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS)

#### Contract Information

| Field Name | Value |
| --- | --- |
| Contract Title (English) | Task-Based Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS) |
| Contract Title (French) | Services professionnels en informatique centrés sur les tâches (S.P.I.C.T) |
| Reference Number | CB-196-2747270 |
| Amendment Number | 4 |
| Solicitation Number | T8080-230350 |
| Publication Date | January 12, 2024 |
| Tender Closing Date | February 13, 2024, 15:00:00 |
| Amendment Date | February 13, 2024 |
| Expected Contract Start Date | None |
| Expected Contract End Date | None |

#### Tender Information

* The procurement process is Competitive – Selective Tendering.
* The procurement category is **SRV**.
* The notice type is **Expired**.

#### Contract Description

Transport Canada requires Task-Based Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS) to provide managerial, functional, and technical system support services to ensure the ongoing maintenance, development, and effective operation of Oracle Financials (ERP) common system solutions.

This procurement is conditionally set aside under the federal government's Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business.

#### Contract Documents and Contact Information

* Tender description, attachment, and related documents are available at [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/29340/t8080-230350---npp.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/29340/t8080-230350---apm.pdf)
* Contact information:
	+ Name: Cory Lajoie
	+ Email: cory.lajoie@tc.gc.ca
	+ Phone: (204) 228-2267
	+ Address: 344 Edmonton St, Winnipeg, Manitoba, Canada
	+ Postal Code: (204) 228-2267

Note: Only the relevant information is included, and the text has been rephrased to ensure it is clear, concise, and in a professional tone. The formatting has also been improved to make it easier to read.  Friday, March 15, 2024
